Title: Return to Lordaeron
Description:
Let's get back behind the walls and meet the others. I think Belmont had the time of his unlife with you, getting to cut down Scarlets again.

But this isn't the end of the Crusade. Even though they lost, they might still turn this into yet another way to recruit.

We'll be ready if they ever come for us again. Or our neighbors.

Come on, let's get back to the Ruins of Lordaeron.
ObjectivesText: Take the portal to return to the Ruins of Lordaeron.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak to Lilian in the Ruins of Lordaeron.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal to Ruins of Lordaeron
